Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/California
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
